task.title: Edit Tier Display Options
task.shortdesc: Select which tiers are visible in Record Data and change the order in which they appear.

step.cmd: Click on the check box to the left of each tier, under Show Tier, to select or de-select the tier for visualization.
step.stepresult: Selected tiers will be visible in the Record Data view, de-selected tiers will not be visible.To hide or show all tiers, use the Hide all tiers/Show all tiers button.

step.cmd: Select any tier which you would like to reorder and use the green up and down arrows to the right of the tier names to change its position within the list.
step.stepresult: The tiers will appear in the revised order in the Record Data view.

step.cmd: Repeat Step 2 for any tiers you would like to reorder.
